UX Design Kickstarter Workshop

Growthschool presents the Perfect Non-Textbook, Hands-On Workshop to Jump-start your Career in User Experience (UX) Design for Beginners. This is a 2-part workshop.
The Perfect Non-Textbook, Hands-On Workshop to Jump-start your Career in User Experience (UX) Design for Beginners. This is a 2-part workshop.
  • 3 + 2 Hours
  • Full Hands On
  • Part 1 : Nov 22,
    3pm - 6pm
  • Live Session
  • Mini Project
  • Part 2 : Nov 24,
    9pm - 11pm

Instructed by

Anudeep Ayyagari

UX Designer, Amazon

his works also found at
Reserve a seat before November 2, 2020 to unlock Bonuses worth ₹9,400
Reserve Seat for ₹499 ₹1,999

What will you learn in the workshop?

In a Practical First approach, this is what you will learn:
✓  My super effective and tested App design process using Figma

Learn and design a micro app live with me
✓  My formula to design that not only looks but works even better

Understand the business impact of design
✓  My Magic Method for learning & applying theory via practice

Learn UX principles from Hands-on exercises
✓  My secret Non-textbook method of learning design tools

The technique of learning tools 10x faster
✓  My ultimate hack for designing with speed and modularity

Learn smart component-based UX design
  Bonus content: Amaze your friends with an animated mini app

Build a supercool animated prototype

How will this workshop help?

In every concept you learn, the approach I use would be to teach you in terms of 3 main things required in the job description for any UX designer today.

Unlock bonuses worth ₹9,400:

Register before November 2, 2020 to unlock the bonuses.
Free Bonus-1
Free Bonus-2
Free Bonus-3
Free Bonus-4
Free Bonus-1
Free Bonus-2
Free Bonus-3
Free Bonus-4
NOTE: Everyone who makes the purchase before November 2, 2020 would be revealed access to bonuses at the end of the workshop
Reserve Seat for ₹499 ₹1,999

Who is this workshop for?

Graphic designers who want to transition into the UX Design field

UX Designers who are just beginning and are looking for growth in the field

Students who want to pursue a career in UX Design and just started learning

Product managers and Developers who want to gain UX Design knowledge

How does this workshop work?

In this hands-on workshop, you will start with a UX Design project right from 1st minute.
  • Attend Live Workshop
  • Do Exercises as You Watch
  • Learn all the Deliverables
  • Finish given Assignment
  • Grab Your Certificate
Reserve Seat for ₹499 ₹1,999

In their actual words...

Experiences shared by people who previously attended this workshop
and many more heartfelt responses…. There is nothing more happy for me than seeing a smile on a students face after they learn something new.

Get the offer while it lasts!

What you’ll get…
  • Design a mini app live with me on Figma
  • Non-textbook method: A tool learning hack to learn 10x faster
  • Learn design for Android and iOS screens.
  • Learn smart component based design: ultimate speed hack
  • Applying UX Principles while designing: Hands-on exercises
  • Learn how to drive business impact via UX design
And bonuses too…
  • Build an animated prototype live with me: Amaze your friends
  • 6 month access to Premium Growth School Design Community training course worth ₹3,000
  • UX Drill Exercises video course worth ₹ 2,050
  • Get a fully functional mobile App UI kit worth ₹ 1,550
  • My Secret UX Principles Course: Not just opinions, win by principles worth ₹ 2,800

UX Design Kickstarter Workshop Launch Offer (Save ₹1,500)

₹499 ₹ 1,999

  • Enroll now and get bonuses worth ₹9,400 absolutely free. There was never a better time to grab this course.
  • Enjoy the discounted price of ₹499 and save a total of ₹1,500.
  • The launch offer expires on midnight of: November 2, 2020
Note: No exceptions would be made beyond the offer expiry date. The prices would go up and no free bonuses
RESERVE A SEAT

Get certified!

Yes! You will be certified for this workshop on submission of your assignment.

Official and verified

Receive an instructor signed certificate with institution’s logo to verify your achievements and increase your job prospects

Easily shareable

Add the certificate to your CV or your Resume or post it directly on LInkedin. You can even post it on instagram and twitter.

Career shifting

Use your certificate to make life changing shift into UX or stay ahead in your UX career. Salaries are among the highest in the world.

Meet your trainer

“Why should learning be different from what you end up doing ?”

I’m Anudeep Ayyagari, a UX designer at Amazon and a mentor.

My works can also be found on ICICI bank app, IndusInd bank app and SBI Pay Bhim, Tapzo and HungerBox

I strongly believe that the only pre-requisite for learning design is just common sense. I have helped many people self learn design and pick UX Design as a career option.

I have conducted various workshops, training programs and mentorship sessions and influenced over 500 students till date.
I strongly believe that the only pre-requisite for learning design is just common sense. I have helped many people self learn design and pick UX Design as a career option.
I have conducted various workshops, training programs and mentorship sessions and influenced over 500 students till date.
My vision is to contribute in the making of next one million highly valued designers from India.
Reserve Seat for ₹499 ₹1,999

Do you know?

₹19L

Experienced UX designers earn an average of ₹19Lakhs per annum with over 10,000 job openings

2nd

UX designer was the 2nd most in-demand role for 2019 and continuing into 2020

2k jobs/m

In India alone, an average of 2,000 jobs are being created every month in the field of UX design

₹5k/hr

Freelance UX designers earn average of ₹5,000 ($70)/hr & the flexibility to work anytime, anywhere

Questions generally asked about the workshop

I made the payment but didn’t receive any email

Please write to : design@growthschool.io, our awesome support team will get back to you in 24 hours.
When is the workshop?

The workshop is on the 22nd November, 2020 from 3PM IST to 6PM IST.

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
What are the pre-requisites?

Common sense is the only pre-requisite for the workshop.
Anyone with any or no experience in design can attend the workshop.

 
 
 
Will this be live or pre-recorded?

This is a completely live session. The live session link will be sent to your registered Email ID 1 hour before the workshop starts.

 
 
 
Would there be any certificate on completion?

Yes! You will receive a certificate on completion of the workshop. You must finish the given assignment to earn your certificate.

 
 
 
When can I receive the bonuses?

You will receive additional bonuses at the end of the workshop

 
 
 
What are the benefits of a UX Design workshop?

You will be able to get acquainted with creating a business model, how to verify ideas, compare them with previous experiences and finally define the scope and produce materials for the implementation in development.

This workshop activities focus on the Users, their journey through the app’s functionalities and the interaction with the system.

Looking forward to see you in the workshop!

 
 
 
Is it worth investing in UX Design workshops?

UX designer was the 2nd most in-demand role for 2019 and continuing into 2020 and experienced UX designers earn an average of ₹19 Lakhs p.a.

In India alone, an average of 2,000 UX Design jobs are being created every month in.

Freelance UX designers earn average of ₹5,000 ($70)/hr along with the flexibility to work anytime, anywhere.

Considering the above, this is the golden time to enter the field and is definitely worth investing in UX Design workshops

 
 
 
Do we need any paid tools for the workshop?

You need not purchase any tool, a free design tool Figma will be used for the workshop. You can create an account before the workshop begins

 
 
 
Reserve Seat for ₹499 ₹1,999
